meanings.definition: The quality or state of being comical.
meanings.sent1: Her performance was full of comicalities that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The movie was filled with comicalities that had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent3: The comicalities in the play added a lighthearted touch to the serious storyline.
meanings.sent4: His clumsy antics on stage were comicalities that brought joy to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The comicalities in the cartoon made it a favorite among children.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes were comicalities that entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The sitcom is known for its hilarious comicalities that keep viewers coming back for more.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected comicalities in the conversation caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: The comicalities of everyday life never fail to bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent5: The comicalities in the book made it a delightful read for all ages.
